name: Mazeberry Express
tag_list: e-commerce, google-analytics, attribution-management, attribution-analysis, content-retargeting, search-campaign, pay-per-click, marketers
overview:
Mazeberry Express is a leading Multitouch Analytics platform which is complementary to Google Analytics and provide solutions to e-commerce merchants of all sizes, helping them to refine, optimize and improve their online marketing cost controls.

This innovative and unique service enables marketers to identify the real performance of online campaigns through a retrospective study of each customer acquisition channel.

In addition, Mazeberry Express technology is the only one to incorporate cost data in its analysis, offering a detailed measure of the ROI of every channel.

The support of experts in Attribution Analytics convinced the leaders of French e-commmerce merchants, such as 3 Suisses International Group , Planet-cards Group, 123fleurs.com or ShoeStyle.fr.
